help.title: settings help
help.description: Displays help with commands in the settings category

initialization.title: settings initialization
initialization.description: For the bot to work, you need to specify a chat where the bot will conduct minigames. The chat is set in the 'chanel' parameter

register.title: settings register
register.description: This command adds your profile to the bot's database so you can use any of the offered minigames
